item.title: CVE-2023-38030|2024-10-03T12:58:30.760Z -- saho -- adm100
item.description: Sahoâ€™s attendance devices ADM100 and ADM-100FP have a vulnerability of missing authentication for critical functions. An unauthenticated remote attacker can execute system commands in partial website URLs to read sensitive device information without permissions.
